message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENTUSAGE_FV_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENT_USAGE_CANCELLED
message.locale: The verification requirement usage cannot be deleted as it has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENTUSAGE_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Verification Requirement Usage with the name specified already exists.Please enter a new Name.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENTUSAGE_XRV_TYPE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Verification Requirement Usage with the type specified already exists.Please enter a new Name.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENTUSAGE_FV_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENT_CANCELLED
message.locale: This Verification Requirement record has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENTUSAGE_XRV_ASSOCIATED_FOR_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: A Verification Requirement Usage for this type within this Verification Requirement already exists.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENTUSAGE_XRV_HAS_ASSOCIATED_VERIFICATION_REQUIREMENT_CANCELLED
message.locale: The verification requirement usage cannot be deleted as it the verification requirement has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENTUSAGE_XRV_HAS_ASSOCIATED_USAGE_VERIFICATION_APPLICATION
message.locale: The verification requirement usage cannot be deleted as it has been used in the application.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENTUSAGE_XRV_HAS_ASSOCIATED_USAGE_VERIFICATION_APPLICATION_MODIFICATION
message.locale: The verification requirement usage cannot be modified as it has been used in the application.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENTUSAGE_INVALID_TYPE_FOR_NON_CASE_DATA_LEVEL
message.locale: Invalid Type for level selected - Only participant evidence can be applied to Non Case Data Level

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONREQUIREMENT_XRV_ASSOCIATED_FOR_VERIFIABLEDATAITEM_EXISTS
message.locale: A Verification Requirement for this Verifiable Data Item already exists for this Case or Non Case Type.
